question_stem:
Question 4

Refer to the following picture taken from Topic 9 lecture notes page 47 on the top 10 frequent 1-itemsets sorted by their support within the Groceries data set:


The minimum support threshold used to determine the frequent 1-itemsets is 0.02 as seen in the lecture. How many 1-itemsets would be considered frequent if the minimum support threshold was increased to 0.1?
A
2
B
6
C
7
D
8
